transcript:
Good luck to you, fellow countrymen. Thanks for the firewe'll return it with interest," said he, carrying away into the darkness a glowing stick. 
Next came four soldiers, carrying something heavy on a cloak, and passed by the fire. One of them stumbled. 
"Who the devil has put the logs on the road?" snarled he. 
"He's deadwhy carry him?" said another. 
"Shut up!" 
And they disappeared into the darkness with their load. 
"Still aching?" Tiishin asked Rost6v in a whisper. 
"Yes."
